title: Karnataka doctor booked for alleged communal post against Muslims, says his account hacked
selftext: The accused, Dr Keerthan Upadhya, works in a private hospital in Udupi’s Brahmavara. On July 13, a person asked on X, “If you could remove one thing from this world, what would it be?” Dr Upadhyan replied, “Muslim community.”
comments: Hi Scary_Asparagus_6890, your submission has been removed as /r/India limits users to 6 submissions in 24 hours.
